text: @realDonaldTrump Do you know why nobody from what you falsely claim to be "Fake News" is not mentioning this? Two reasons: 1) it is not a fact 2) they are more interested in the narratives of the Coronavirus. Why are you fixated on politics on one of the holiest days of the year?
